data.title: SonicWall
data.text:
SonicWall 2024 Cyber Threat Report

Almost 18 months ago, SonicWall kicked off an outside-in approach across all of their business, with the focus on truly understanding the needs and pain points of our partners and customers and using that insight to drive the delivery of our products and services.

2023 was a significant year that started to show the results of that approach, and this report details some of the key findings.

About SonicWall

SonicWall is a cybersecurity forerunner with more than 30 years of expertise and a relentless focus on its partners. With the ability to build, scale and manage security across the cloud, hybrid and traditional environments in real time, SonicWall can quickly and economically provide purpose-built security solutions to any organisation around the world.
